author: IGN
description:
Check out the play style of the fourth character in Season Pass 4, Lucy, in this trailer for Guilty Gear Strive, an action fighting game developed by Arc System Works. Players can soon gain access to a new playable character with the Season Pass 4 as Lucy takes to the fight. Lucy is scheduled to be released on August 21, 2025 with the Season Pass 4 of Guilty Gear Strive on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #GuiltyGearStrive
title: Guilty Gear Strive - Official Lucy Character Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Invincible VS is the new fighting game set in the comic-book-turned-TV-show universe of Invincible. Featuring fighters like Invincible himself, Atom Eve, Battle Beast, and the recently announced Omni-Man, it comes with all the gore and carnage you would expect from the source material. Invincible VS is coming in 2026 to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #InvincibleVSOmniMan
title: Invincible VS - Official Omni-Man Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the PS5 Closed Beta Announcement Trailer for Marvel Tokon: Fighting Souls, an upcoming action fighting game developed by ARC System Works. Players can take a dip into the wider Marvel Universe to duke it out in intense fighting battles with Marvel's biggest heroes including Spider-Man, Iron Man, Doctor Strange, Storm, Dr. Doom, and more, in an upcoming closed beta for the game. The closed beta will be fitted with 6 playable characters, online matches, spectator mode, training tutorial, and more. Marvel Tokon: Fighting Souls is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC with a closed beta running from September 5 through September 7 exclusively on PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#MarvelTokonFightingSouls #Gaming #PS5
title: Marvel Tokon: Fighting Souls - Official PS5 Closed Beta Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the C. Viper Teaser Trailer for Street Fighter 6, the latest character trailer to the classic fighting game franchise developed by Capcom. Take a look at the latest trailer to see C. Viper in action and master her moves, abilities, and watch out for the techniques she'll bring to the game. C. Viper is launching into Street Fighter 6 autumn 2025.

#IGN #StreetFighter6CViper
title: Street Fighter 6 - Official C. Viper Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
We went by the Digital Eclipse booth at Evo 2025 to talk to their Head of Production, Stephen Frost, about the new Mortal Kombat Legacy Kollection, why it's more than just games, the documentary footage they shot, and why they included the games that they did.

Thanks to World of Longplay for the use of their footage!
https://longplays.org/home.php
https://www.youtube.com/WorldofLongplays

PSX Longplay Mortal Kombat Mythologies: Sub-Zero (played by RickyC)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5tbZCEGX7mc
PSX Longplay Mortal Kombat: Special Forces (EU) (played by Ravenlord)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=okr1gbv3YGk

#ign #MortalKombatLegacyKollection
title: Mortal Kombat Legacy Kollection - Developer Interview | EVO 2025

author: IGN
description:
Invincible VS is the new fighting game set in the comic-book-turned-TV-show universe of Invincible. Featuring fighters like Invincible himself, Atom Eve, and the recently announced Battle Beast, it comes with all the gore and carnage you would expect from the source material. Here’s some gameplay between developers, straight from Evo 2025, so they can really show off what Invincible is capable of.

#IGN #InvincibleVS
title: Invincible VS High-Level Gameplay | EVO 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Weapons' Trailer for Lost Soul Aside, an upcoming action RPG developed by Ultizero Games. Save your younger sister -and the whole of humanity- while fighting your own way, switching weapons, mixing attack patterns and learning your enemy’s movements in adrenaline-pumping battles charged with spectacular visual effects. Lost Soul Aside is launching on August 29 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC.

#IGN #LostSoulAside
title: Lost Soul Aside  - Official Weapons Trailer
